description:
TRY OUR POP LITTLE GIRL MOVIE POP - THE FUN & COLORFUL CINEMA THEATER POPCORN GAME

In this game, little girl is holding the bar who try to hit different color of popcorn on top. This is happening in the theater where you have to balance your bar to hit.
Collect the magic power to increase the size of the bar.

Features:
- Most addictive and fun game
- Amazing graphics and effects
- Cool soundtrack
- Easy to play but difficult to win

How to play?

- Balance the bar to hit the popcorn
- Collect magic power
- Be quick to make high score

DOWNLOAD TODAY FOR FREE >>> POP LITTLE GIRL MOVIE POP - THE FUN & COLORFUL CINEMA THEATER POPCORN GAME
